The expert analyzed the original speech: S. Rep. Ilhan Omar to determine the context and wording of her statement about the Council on American-Islamic Relations (CAIR) being founded after 9/11.
The expert consulted CAIR: s website and reports to verify its mission and activities, which include promoting a positive image of Islam and Muslims in America and advocating for American Muslim civil rights.
The expert sought clarification from Oma: s staff, who admitted that she made a misstatement and now acknowledges that CAIR was founded earlier than she initially stated.
